snippet: The bickering that has plagued the development of a uniform patent system in Europe foreshadows the problems that another crucial effort, the creation of a banking union, could face.
abstract: European Parliament adopts uniform patent system for Europe, effort to remedy country-by-country approach whose time and costs have long been impeded innovation across European Union; plan is expected to go into effect by 2014.
lead_paragraph: The bickering that has plagued the development of a uniform patent system in Europe foreshadows the problems that another crucial effort, the creation of a banking union, could face.

headline.seo: European Parliament Adopts Uniform Patent System
headline.main: Europe Reaches Agreement on System for Patents
headline.print_headline: Single Patent System Moves Forward in Europe, and Banking Rules Could Be Next
